title: Ebro In The Morning - Tom Hanks Gets Angry + Drake Releases New Album!
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 6/22/2022.

Ebro, Rosenberg, Laura Stylez and the crew are in the studio discussing Drake's new album 'Honestly, Nevermind', Boston Celtics lose NBA Finals with Peter in the building, Tom Hanks "the nicest man in America" gets angry after fans mob he and his wife after a Sirius Radio visit, and Juneteenth/Father's Day on the way! 

All that and more on Ebro In The Morning!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
